content: ['pragma solidity ^0.8.17;contract Factory {    event Log(address addr);    // Deploys a contract that always returns 42    function deploy() external {        bytes memory bytecode = hex"69602a60005260206000f3600052600a6016f3";        address addr;        assembly {            // create(value, offset, size)            addr := create(0, add(bytecode, 0x20), 0x13)        }        require(addr != address(0));        emit Log(addr);    }}interface IContract {    function getMeaningOfLife() external view returns (uint);}// https://www.evm.codes/playground/*Run time code - return 42602a60005260206000f3// Store 42 to memorymstore(p, v) - store v at memory p to p + 32PUSH1 0x2aPUSH1 0MSTORE// Return 32 bytes from memoryreturn(p, s) - end execution and return data from memory p to p + sPUSH1 0x20PUSH1 0RETURNCreation code - return runtime code69602a60005260206000f3600052600a6016f3// Store run time code to memoryPUSH10 0X602a60005260206000f3PUSH1 0MSTORE// Return 10 bytes from memory starting at offset 22PUSH1 0x0aPUSH1 0x16RETURN*/']
